post_call_analysis_data.name: agreement_appointment
post_call_analysis_data.description: User's agreement to our appointment: (yes, no)

post_call_analysis_data.name: should_send_confirmation
post_call_analysis_data.description: Whether we should send appointment confirmation message to the client through whatsapp: (yes, no)

post_call_analysis_data.name: appointment_date
post_call_analysis_data.description: Confirmed appointment date/time in local spoken format (e.g., 2025-10-31)

post_call_analysis_data.name: appointment_time
post_call_analysis_data.description: Confirmed appointment time in local spoken format (e.g., 14:00)

post_call_analysis_data.name: should_make_call_again
post_call_analysis_data.description: Whether the agent should make call again or not: (yes, no)

post_call_analysis_data.name: call_again_reason
post_call_analysis_data.description: Reason for calling again: (available_time, user_busy, other)

post_call_analysis_data.name: scarity_method
post_call_analysis_data.description: The user wants an earlier date than the one we suggested. Therefore, you suggest you will check the availability of the earlier date and will contact the user via whatsapp.

analysis_successful_prompt: Evaluate whether the agent seems to have a successful call with the user, where the agent finishes the task, and the call was complete without being cutoff.
analysis_summary_prompt: Write a 1-3 sentence summary of the call based on the call transcript. Should capture the important information and actions taken during the call.
